trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> event when a Delete button in the control is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>事件時刪除 按鈕控制項中按下或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>呼叫的方法，但之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: ([刪除] 按鈕就按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete"。)這可讓您提供事件處理方法，執行自訂的常式，每當發生此事件，例如檢查刪除作業的結果。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: This object enables you to determine the number of items affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: 此物件可讓您判斷受影響項目可能會發生任何例外狀況的數目。

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷已刪除作業所影響的項目數目，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷是否有發生任何例外狀況，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can indicate whether you have handled the exception in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 您可以指出是否已設定處理中的事件處理方法的例外狀況<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 刪除作業期間發生的例外狀況和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To access the key fields of the deleted item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取已刪除的項目索引鍵欄位，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: To access non-key fields of the deleted item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取非索引鍵欄位的已刪除的項目，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值清單，請參閱 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> 建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> object to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>物件，以判斷是否刪除作業期間發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> object is passed to the event-handling method for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>物件傳遞至事件處理方法，以便<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>事件。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 刪除作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The exception that was raised when the delete operation was performed, if any.
trans-unit.target: 在執行刪除作業時引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

trans-unit.source: If no exception was raised, use <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有引發任何例外狀況，請使用 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用這個建構函式來初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.
trans-unit.target: 在引發事件時，這個建構函式主要會由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表所顯示的是 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> 類別之執行個體的初始屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: 屬性

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `affectedRows` 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: The value of the `e` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `e` 參數的值。

trans-unit.source: `false`.
trans-unit.target: `false`。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得刪除作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 刪除作業所影響的資料列數目。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property to determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, as reported by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>屬性來判斷所影響的刪除作業的項目數目，資料來源控制項所報告。

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used to determine whether the correct number of items were deleted in the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性通常用來判斷是否正確數目的項目已刪除下列方式：

trans-unit.source: To verify that only a single item was deleted.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認只有單一項目已刪除。

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an incorrectly written delete statement can delete multiple items.
trans-unit.target: 有時撰寫不正確的 delete 陳述式可能會刪除多個項目。

trans-unit.source: To verify that an item was deleted if an error occurs during the delete operation but no exception was raised.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認已刪除項目，是否刪除作業期間發生錯誤，但沒有引發例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To verify that an item was deleted when a data source control that supports optimistic concurrency (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls) has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: 若要確認已刪除項目，支援開放式並行存取的資料來源控制項時 (例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>控制項) 有其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>屬性設定為`ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues`列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Under this setting, an item that has been modified by another user might not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: 此設定時，可能不會刪除已由其他使用者修改的項目。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property to verify that an item was deleted during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>屬性，確認刪除作業期間已刪除項目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception, if any, that was raised during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 取得刪除作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)。

trans-unit.source: The exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 在刪除作業中引發的例外狀況 (如果有的話)，否則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to get the exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性來取得已刪除作業期間引發的例外狀況，如果有的話。

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有引發例外狀況，這個屬性會傳回 `null`。

trans-unit.source: If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 如果引發例外狀況和您處理的例外狀況的事件處理常式中，設定中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性`true`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 否則，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property to determine whether an exception occurred during a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性來判斷是否刪除作業期間發生例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否在事件處理常式中處理刪除作業中引發的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果例外狀況在事件處理常式中已經過處理，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to indicate whether you handled the exception during the event.
trans-unit.target: 當刪除作業中引發例外狀況時，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性，指出您是否處理事件時的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`true`，會被視為處理，而且不會重新擲回的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個屬性設定為`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>控制項會重新擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷引發的例外狀況，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to indicate that the exception was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>屬性來表示，已處理例外狀況的事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key or keys for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 取得刪除之項目的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The key or keys for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 刪除之項目的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property) for a deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性來存取的索引鍵欄位的值 (依指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性) 的已刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這些值來記錄已刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: This property contains only the key fields.
trans-unit.target: 此屬性包含索引鍵的欄位。

trans-unit.source: To access the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取非索引鍵欄位，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性會傳回該物件會實作<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>介面。

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the key fields of the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 物件包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>物件，表示已刪除的項目索引鍵欄位。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property to access the values of the key fields for a deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性來存取已刪除的項目索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Gets the non-key field values for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 取得刪除之項目的非索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: The non-key field values for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 刪除之項目的非索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>屬性來存取已刪除項目的非索引鍵欄位的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這些值來記錄已刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> templates, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>雙向繫結運算式中使用時，才會填入屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>範本，例如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>範本。

trans-unit.source: For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca).
trans-unit.target: 如需雙向繫結運算式的詳細資訊，請參閱[資料繫結運算式語法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>屬性會傳回該物件會實作<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>介面。

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 物件包含<xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>非索引鍵欄位的已刪除的項目表示的物件。

trans-unit.source: This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property) for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性不包含索引鍵欄位 (依指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性) 的已刪除的項目。

trans-unit.source: To access the key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要存取的索引鍵欄位，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>屬性來存取已刪除項目的非索引鍵欄位的值。
